Reviews.Title: First Class all Metal Construction.
Reviews.Author: Stephen C. Wilson "Careful shopper"
Reviews.Content: This unit is better quality than I expected. The housing is all metal I like the wide angle. When installed in the corner of a room the entire room is viewed except directly below the camera. will easily mount on any surface, ceiling wall or atop a shelf and the ball can be rotated to align the picture correctly.  because of the wide angle there is a little more distortion further away from the camera  I will buy more of these.Highly recommended..
